screen_desc: The screenshot shows the mobile version of the eBay website. At the top, there's a search bar for users to search for items, followed by quick access categories such as "Electronics," "Clothing & Accessories," and "Selling." The main area of the screen displays promotional banners offering deals like "Hosting made easy" for kitchen and home essentials and "Get up to 60% off AirPods" for refurbished AirPods. Below those, there are suggestions for "the hottest holiday gifts," including game consoles, Barbies, and Dyson Airwrap stylers.
action_think: The user has requested to clear the shopping cart on eBay, followed by a search for 'usb-a', selecting the first entry, and adding it to the cart. Currently, we are on the homepage of eBay on a mobile browser. The first step should be to navigate to the shopping cart to see if there are any items to clear. The shopping cart icon can be located at the top right of the eBay homepage, next to the search icon.
action_plan: Click on the shopping cart icon to view the cart.
Remove any items from the cart if present.
After the cart is cleared, navigate back to the eBay homepage.
Click on the search bar at the top of the page.
Type 'usb-a' into the search bar and execute the search.
Select the first entry from the search results.
Add the first entry to the shopping cart.
action_desc: Click on the shopping cart icon at the top right corner of the screen.
action_result:
